title: Messages on the Death of President Zakir Husain of India.
text:
Dear Mr. President:

All Americans join me in sending you and the people of India our deep sympathy for your great loss. We mourn with you on this sad occasion. Zakir Husain was a man of courage and integrity whose loss will be long felt. Sincerely,

RICHARD NIXON

India has lost a great statesman. We mourn the death of Zakir Husain, a man admired by all for his service to humanity. You and your people have my deepest sympathy in this time of sadness. Sincerely,

RICHARD NIXON
garbage_collected: [V. V. Giri, Acting President of India]
